column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, presenting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section. The observation is made on slice n°124 from the right hemisphere of the skull. The following elements are present in the image: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 967.6758 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 7893.0176 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 286.0840 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 85.6934 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1741.5527 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 242.5781 mm³, the third ventricle of volume 19.7754 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 77.7832 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1074.4629 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 94.9219 mm³, the left ventral diencephalon of volume 261.0352 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1.3184 mm³.
